loresheets.Name: Aino 'Lil Gaia' Metsala
loresheets.Description: A Finnish activist who only recently underwent the change but has already established a network of reliable allies to be called upon in the fight for Gaia.

loresheets.Name: Alejandro 'Vaporfang' Mendoza
loresheets.Description: A legendary Bone Gnawer hacker. (REQUIRES 2 DOTS IN TECHNOLOGY) --- By associating with him you gain access to a deep network of information, private forums and media sources to both understand and spread your message.

loresheets.Name: Jonas Albrecht
loresheets.Description: A legendary Silver Fang Ahroun fallen to Harano. Once the personification of the Garou Nation he could be again, with your help.

loresheets.Name: Liu 'Returning Maiden' Aihan
loresheets.Description: A Galestalker astronaut who has stepped foot on Luna herself. Liu has a deep understanding of rites, ritual and the umbra.

loresheets.Name: Monkeywrenchers
loresheets.Description: You run with a large, decentralized global pack that is dedicated to fucking up Pentex Group. Through information sharing you've learned how to really hurt Pentex.

loresheets.Name: Oba 'Trailblazer' Makinde
loresheets.Description: A legendary Glass Walker Theurge who runs the company Omniscient, a revolutionary AI platform that like its name states has access to real-time data across the world. By knowing Makinde, you have access to a reliable tech job at the company.

loresheets.Name: Renunciate of Fenris
loresheets.Description: You refused to follow your pack-mates down the path of hauglosk. You broke your pact with Wolf and have found a home in another tribe under another Patron.

loresheets.Name: Ross 'The She-Wolf' Jackson
loresheets.Description: A Silent Strider who has mastered shapeshifting to the point of being able to change sex at will. You are deeply embedded in minority groups and other marginalized groups.

loresheets.Name: Project Twilight
loresheets.Description: You've worked with the government run kill-team Project Twilight. Your contacts within the organization may provide valuable information or tip you off to hunter movements.

loresheets.Name: The Black Spiral
loresheets.Description: You have an interest in the Black Spiral and are able to understand some of it's many mysteries. You may also have contacts within the Black Spiral Dancer's. Perhaps, you may even be able to pull a Garou from the madness of the Wyrm.

loresheets.Name: Umbral Traveler
loresheets.Description: You have a particular interest and expertise in exploring the Umbra, a tiny fraction of it's infinite mysteries are better understood to you.

loresheets.Name: Vandana 'The Impressario' Puri
loresheets.Description: A legendary party planner and Moot organizer. None in the Garou nation are better at running a rite, overseeing the first change or just bringing Garou together.
